full_description:
Titan Talk Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Titan Talk Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is designed to enhance your everyday life. It allows you to make crystal clear calls, store and listen to music, monitor your health, and enjoy a host of other exciting features. With its sleek design and advanced technology, the Titan Talk Smart Watch is the perfect companion for both men and women.

Bluetooth Calling with Crystal Voice Technology

The Titan Talk Smart Watch allows you to make and receive calls directly from your wrist. Keep in touch without having to reach for your phone.

AMOLED Display

The Titan Talk smartwatch features a large 1.39" AMOLED display with a resolution of 454 x 454, providing an immersive visual experience. Whether you're viewing notifications, browsing through watch faces, or accessing various apps, the vibrant display ensures clarity and ease of use.

AI Voice Assistant

Titan Talk Smart Watch lets you connect to AI voice assistants like Ok Google or Hey Siri with just a tap. Get quick answers, set reminders, control smart home devices, and perform various tasks using voice commands. The smartwatch is compatible with both Android and iOS operating systems, ensuring wide compatibility with your devices.

Music Storage with TWS Connect

The Titan Talk Smart Watch offers music storage capabilities, allowing you to store and listen to your playlist directly from your wrist. The TWS Connect feature enables you to connect your audio devices wirelessly to the watch, providing a seamless and immersive audio experience.

Complete Health Suite

The Titan Talk Smart Watch also prioritizes your health and well-being. It features a SpO2 tracker, 24x7 heart rate monitor, sleep monitor, breathing exercise, and a women's health tracker. Stay informed about your vital health metrics and track your fitness progress with precision.

Long Battery Life

The Titan Talk Smart Watch offers a range of exciting features to enhance your daily life. Enjoy built-in games, find your phone with ease, control your camera and music playback, use the built-in calculator, and stay updated with the weather forecast. The smartwatch comes with a long-lasting battery that can provide up to 5 days of usage, ensuring uninterrupted performance throughout your day. It is also IP68 water-resistant, offering protection against water and dust.

Titan Evoke Bluetooth Calling Silicon Strap Smart Watch

The elegant Titan Evoke Silicon Smart Watch is masterfully combines the technology with classic style. In addition to improving the watch's aesthetic appeal, its 1.43" Display offers a easy-to-use interface for smooth navigation. With BT Calling and an intelligent voice assistant, you can enjoy the convenience of hands-free, seamless conversation. Aside from its attractive design, the wristwatch prioritizes wellness with features like as sleep monitoring, SpO2 tracking, and 24x7 heart rate monitoring that give a comprehensive picture of your overall health. A password lock option adds an extra layer of security to your data. The watch also includes an in-built game to keep you entertained in your spare time. The Titan Evoke Silicon Smart Watch is an excellent companion for individuals who respect both style and functionality. Its extended battery life of up to five days ensures that customers will have enough time between charges.

A Screen Made For Greatness

The Titan Evoke Silicon Smart Watch comes with the display size of 1.43" and a resolution of 466*466 pixel which makes the watch screen very smooth. It's 1000 Nits Brightness is very eye soothing and give excellent performance.

SingleSync Bluetooth Calling

Titan Evoke Silicon Smart Watch Bluetooth Calling allows customers to make and receive calls straight from their wristwatch via a Bluetooth connection with their associated smartphone. This feature improves convenience by allowing customers to stay connected without having to take out their phones. Furthermore, the intelligent voice assistant may supplement the Bluetooth Calling functionality by enabling voice commands for a variety of functions.

60+ Sports Mood

The Titan Evoke Silicon Smart Watch includes 60+ sports modes, indicating a highly versatile fitness monitoring capability. This might suggest that the wristwatch is designed to track and assess a wide range of physical activities, providing users with specific metrics and insights tailored to various sports and exercises.

full_description:
Titan Talk S Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Titan Talk S Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is designed to keep you connected and motivated throughout your day. It smartwatch provides an immersive experience with its crystal clear AMOLED display, advanced Bluetooth calling capabilities, music storage, and a wide range of sports modes. Whether you're taking calls, enjoying your favorite tunes, or tracking your fitness progress, the Titan Talk S Smart Watch is the perfect companion for active individuals.

1.78" AMOLED Display

The Titan Talk S Smart Watch comes with a 1.78" AMOLED display and a high pixel resolution of 368 x 448, every detail comes to life. Enjoy clear visuals, sharp text, and vibrant colors, making it easy to navigate through various apps, notifications, and watch faces. The large display ensures a comfortable viewing experience, whether you're checking messages, tracking your fitness, or simply glancing at the time.

Advanced BT Calling

Titan Talk S Smart Watch offers an advanced Bluetooth calling feature that allows you to talk through your wrist, providing a hands-free calling experience on the go. Simply connect your phone to the smartwatch once, and you can enjoy crystal-clear conversations without reaching for your phone. Stay connected and stay focused on your activities.

Music Storage and Wireless Audio Connect

The Titan Talk S Smart Watch lets you save your playlist directly on the watch and listen to songs while you run, workout, or go about your day. The wireless audio connect feature enables you to connect your audio devices, such as headphones or speakers, to the watch wirelessly. Share your music and enjoy a seamless audio experience without the hassle of carrying your phone.

100+ Sports Modes and Health Tracking

Titan Talk S Smart Watch offers over 100 sports modes to track and challenge yourself in various activities, whether it's basketball, badminton, football, or any other sport. Keep track of your progress, set goals, and stay motivated on your fitness journey. The smartwatch also features a stress monitor and mood indicator, providing all-round health metrics for an improved lifestyle.

Rotatory Crown

The Titan Talk S Smart Watch offers a smooth navigation experience with its rotatory crown. Easily scroll through menus, notifications, and apps with the rotating functional crown, providing a convenient and intuitive user interface.

Long Battery Life

Titan Talk S Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch has a long battery life of up to 5 days, ensuring uninterrupted performance throughout your active lifestyle.
